          <title>
            <string language="en">Making alkalis from common substances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden der Alkalien von den geläufigen

comunes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how alkalis are created from salt and limestone.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment des alcalis sont

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como os alcalóides são

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo los álcalis se crean
